content: Is there any way to turn on rainbow highlighting in VS Code? The code seems to only be hooked up to the CLI interface, and I can't find it in the docs either
It's gone now, and was broken before. I don't think it plays very well with semantic highlighting. It worked when we hod our own implementation of that.

Yeah, it's a bit of a dead code now sadly. Though, I wonder if we can resuscitate that? I imagine we can add 32 hard-coded modifires with names like "RainbowN", and then just apply those in semantic highlighting?

welp, that won't work, because modifiers are encoded as bitset, so there are 32 total.

So the client side needs to implement the custom decorator-based logic (
